summary: Soldiers and scientists visit a remote island, the site of bio-weapons research, after losing contact with the staff there.
cast: Tess Panzer|Brandon Laatsch|Tate Ammons|Eric Raymond Lim|Matt Lagan|Jeff Castle|Christina Jones|Michael Cummings|Tansy Alexander|Michelle Ehrman|Heldine Aguiluz|Victoria Floro|Debbie Cameron|Rodney Wiseman|Jai Koutrae|Zero Kazama|Mary Christina Brown|Rob O'Brien|Marc Rita|M.E. Lewis|Andre Benjamin|Bryan Abrams|Lance Hardslate|Duke Langdon|Harvey Diamante|Jason Harder
title: Dark Island
